info.name: Scrapping extention API
info.description:
StartFragment

The Scraping Extension is a Google Chrome extension that allows users to easily scrape content from web pages and interact with a question-answering system. With this extension, you can extract text from web pages, ask questions, and receive answers in real time.

EndFragment

request.description:
StartFragment

The Scraping Extension's "Scrape Content" feature allows you to extract information from web pages. With a simple request to the endpoint `http://localhost:8000/scrape?url=https://www.cricbuzz.com/`, you can scrape the content from the specified URL.

  

EndFragment

StartFragment

This endpoint allows you to ask questions and receive answers from the question answering system.

#### Request

- Method: GET
- Path: `/ask`
- Query Parameters:
    - ques - The question you want to ask (e.g., "who won the match?")

EndFragment
